 You want to talk about Kerry in war? I'm not saying I'm neccesarily blaming him, but I just don't find him all that heroic. Compare that with, say, John McCain, who spent years in a POW camp and was offered the chance to go home...he turned it down, because he wouldn't leave his fellow prisoners. That's heroism.
